Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate(n).

programme.title: Who's That Knocking at My Door
programme.desc: Harvey Keitel plays a tough Italian-American who prefers hanging out with a rough and ready street gang to spending time with his increasingly frustrated girlfriend. Urban crime story, with Zina Bethune and Anne Colette(n).

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell(n).

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A charming psychopath meets a tennis professional on a train and suggests that they each commit a murder on the other's behalf. However, when the deranged man goes through with his part of the deal, the sportsman faces a race against time to prove his innocence. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger and Ruth Roman(n).

Western, starring Ed Harris, Viggo Mortensen, Jeremy Irons and Renee Zellweger(n).

Starring Martin Balsam, So Yamamura, Joseph Cotten, James Whitmore and Jason Robards(n).

programme.title: Tangerines

Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian(n).

Black comedy, starring Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling and Jason Schwartzman(n).

Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss(n).

David Fincher's crime thriller based on Gillian Flynn's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike and Neil Patrick Harris(n).

Drama, directed by and starring Dennis Hopper, with Peter Fonda, Jack Nicholson and Phil Spector(n).

Comedy, adapted by Terry Gilliam from Hunter S Thompson's book, starring Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Ellen Barkin, Christina Ricci and Tobey Maguire(n).(n)

programme.title: The Devils

When an obsessed nun accuses him of witchcraft, the cleric's enemies strike, using increasingly brutal tactics in their efforts to prove him a heretic. Ken Russell's historical drama, starring Oliver Reed and Vanessa Redgrave(n).(n)

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A charming psychopath meets a tennis professional on a train and suggests that they each commit a murder on the other's behalf. However, when the deranged man goes through with his part of the deal, the sportsman faces a race against time to prove his innocence. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger and Ruth Roman(n).(n)

programme.title: The Burning

Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer(n).(n)

Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon(n).(n)

Sci-fi drama, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Michael Caine(n).(n)

Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green(n).(n)

Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley(n).(n)

Drama, directed by Gus Van Sant and starring Matt Damon and Casey Affleck(n).

Thriller from director Paul Verhoeven, starring Sharon Stone, Michael Douglas, George Dzundza and Jeanne Tripplehorn(n).

programme.desc: The Earth is bombarded by what appear to be meteors, but turn out to be the vanguard of an alien invasion force. Sci-fi thriller, with Aaron Eckhart and Ramon Rodriguez(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cousins Ham, Cora and Job come to stay on Walton's Mountain, but they prove to be out-and-out crooks(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After meeting an itinerant singer, a restless Mary Ellen decides to run away from home. programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and her friend Andy find a mother dog in a trap and two puppies nearby. They take the `dogs' home, only to find out they are wolves(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A spate of burglaries in Walnut Grove prompts Laura and Andy to become amateur detectives. The duo set out to catch the culprit in the act, but their efforts only end up making matters worse after Charles is caught in one of their traps(n).

Drama, starring Patty Duke, Margot Kidder and James Farentino(n).

programme.title: The Christmas Choir
programme.desc: A workaholic accountant is forced to reassess his priorities after his devotion to his job costs him his girlfriend. Drama, starring Jason Gedrick and Tyrone Benskin(n).

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A girl befriended by the family is shocked to learn her drunken father was responsible for burning down the school to prevent Miss Hunter teaching the theory of evolution(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A disheartened Doc Baker holds himself responsible for Farmer Novack's death and, unable to face the man's seven-months pregnant widow, leaves Walnut Grove(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Jesse James and his brother Frank hide out in Walnut Grove disguised as wealthy businessmen and try to blend into the background. They also hire Mary to do their work(n).(n)

Drama, based on a true story, starring Meryl Streep(n).(n)

programme.desc: A woman marries a dangerously volatile man, who one night shoots a man in a fit of rage. Fact-based drama, starring Lea Thompson, James Marshall, Patricia Kalember and Robert Englund(n).(n)

Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff(n).(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Ronald James, a respected reporter and anti-drug advocate, is shocked to come home and find out that his son has turned him into the police for cocaine addiction(n).

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of an old friend who cannot afford to support himself and care for his comatose son. Eli Wallach guest stars(n).

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A man tries to raise money for his own ranch by breaking in wild horses, but his dreams are ruined when he gets kicked in the head by an animal. Gary Busey guest stars(n).

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A boy is shunned by his peers for refusing to take on his father in a fist fight as part of a traditional ritual of manhood. Guest starring Robert Urich (Spenser for Hire)(n).

Thriller, starring real-life husband and wife Corbin Bernsen and Amanda Pays alongside Neve Campbell(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth has disturbing dreams and begins sleepwalking. John-Boy realises there is a connection between her nightmares and a childhood experience that she cannot remember(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin's first love returns to town and intends to marry her, but her parents think she is too young and want her to finish school first(n).

programme.title: In Defense of Kids
programme.desc: An encounter with a young runaway leads a lawyer to devote her career to representing abused and neglected youngsters. Drama, starring Blythe Danner and Sam Waterston(n).

Fact-based drama, starring Anne Bancroft, Lynn Whitfield, Alice Krige and Cara Buono(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John searches for a missing soldier, Jim Bob is attacked by a grieving father, and the family receives distressing news from the front line(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson storms out after an argument with Harriet. Their neighbours fear they will divorce, and try to get them to reconcile(n).

programme.title: A War of Children

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A young man with no particular direction in life has a breakdown after finding out that the girl he is in love with is pregnant(n).(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A lonely female novelist is in love with a legendary spy hero who has been dead for 20 years. She buys his sports car in an auction only to find out that his ghost comes with the car(n).(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica befriends a boy whose mother and sister were killed in an accident, but later learns one of them is still alive(n).(n)

programme.sub-title: Show Me the Way to Go Home.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John gets an office job while business is slow at the mill, but finds adjusting to a new daily routine difficult(n).(n)

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso(n).(n)

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer

programme.title: The Waltons

Fact-based drama, starring Anne Bancroft, Lynn Whitfield, Alice Krige and Cara Buono(n).(n)

programme.desc: A unique music documentary celebrating 40 years of rock 'n' roll icon Bruce Springsteen. Combined with the never-before-seen archival footage of Bruce's performances throughout his career, and his incredible music, this is a film for the people, by the people(n).
